Posts.Content: I just had a bilateral masectomy less than a week ago.  With 10 women in my family with breast cancer, I know I've chosen the right treatment for me.  Still, I miss my old self and have had moments of second-guessing my decision.  It really helped to read your message and the others on this website.  Thanks.
Posts.Title: Bi-lateral Masectomy
